bibl.author: Schiefner, Franz Anton von
bibl.title: Bharatae responsa Tibetice cum versione Latina
bibl.note: Viro illustrissimo victori Bouniakowsky ... gratulatur Imperialis Academiae Scientiarum Petropolitanae classis historico-philologica. Bharatae responsa Tibetice cum versione Latina ab Antonio Schiefner edita. [gsos-pahi-lanbzhugs-so. A Tibetan version of the lost Indian original of the fable of Bidrai, known in the Semitic versions as the Story of Bīlār.]
